individual_lost_and_found_content.section_description:
Have you ever found yourself leaving a taxi and realizing that you lost or misplaced your precious items, with no way of retrieving them? iPhones, Laptops, personal items can add up to thousands dollars, and also host personal/private information. Losing them is NOT an option…

 

At Lostings we take losing your items very seriously and have built an intelligent system to retrieve items lost or misplaced at in taxis or car services. Our intelligent taxi lost and found matching system automatically processes each lost or found submission. We then match and identify items by a number of different criteria for better accuracy in identifying the lost or found property. Once potential matches are generated, we automatically connect you and the taxi driver or taxi company who has found your lost or misplaced property.

 

  • Our taxi lost and found is the ideal solution for finding items lost in taxis
  • Submit your lost items into the largest taxi lost and found matching system
  • Local taxi drivers and passengers will get a chance to see you submission
  • Be connected to taxi drivers & passengers automatically

 

Submitting lost or found items has never been easier, simply enter the details of the lost or found property and let our smart matching system get to work for you.

section_2_items.item_description:
• Easily Submit lost and found items into our intelligent matching system
  • Hassle free account signup process, auto-generate profile and start submitting items
  • Intelligent matching system which identifies and matches lost or found items
  • All submissions processed through our lost and found matching system
  • Receive notification alerts of property that pair’s with your submission
  • Contact the user who’s item potentially matches yours
  • Feature lost items to display on all of our websites and social media platforms
  • Ability to edit your lost or found submission, add photos, print fliers, manage submissions, email potential matches, etc
  • Search Lostings database to gain access to previously submitted lost or found items
  • The Website and Mobile Website are all one dynamic platform that is streamlined to seamlessly work together

On order to access all of the Lostings features, submit a lost or found item.

• U.S. Based Airports
  • Domestic Airlines
  • TSA Checkpoints
  • Airport Shuttles
  • Hotels & Resorts
  • Vets, Animal Shelter’s & Animal Hospitals
  • College and Universities
  • Local Taxi Companies & Car Services
  • Music and Sports Venues & Arenas
  • Transportation Authorities
  • Bars & Night Clubs
  • Restaurants & Cafes
  • Rental Car Companies
  • Museums
  • Public Parks
